availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen M. Jones (Estill County, Kentucky, laborer)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, laborer. Virginia native. Son of William Jones and Sarah Jones. Married to Mary F. Tipton Jones in Estill County, Kentucky, on August 3, 1865. Student in Lee County, Virginia, in 1850. Laborer in Estill County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Estill County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Lee County, District 31, p. 352A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 202.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Millers Creek, p. 562B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Estill County, KY, August and December 1863, p. 191.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #001760329, p. 42.
